content.description: Really cool, but pumpy lie-backing up a crack feature that is in-cut on one side, but flaring on the other! The first and second bolt are spaced, so be ready to go full commitment! I found the crux to be toward the top. There's currently a large block toward the top right that seems like it's sketchy, but after cranking, pulling, and standing on it I think it's solid. Felt a lot harder than the other 12A's in the area, so I'm going to say it's 12- and not feel bad about it.
content.location: I built a make shift belay ledge, to access it, do not hike straight up the belay ledge, instead hike up and then drop down onto the ledge located at the bottom (right side) of the crag.
